overview: "Dream Speaker" tells the story of when God closes one door for you, he often opens another door for you! The story tells the story of a security guard who suffers from severe stuttering and hearing impairment through the care of his parents, especially the strictness, encouragement and encouragement of his father who is a "retired soldier". Going to the other half of my life... Coupled with my strong perseverance and persevering spirit, I have overcome the fear of hearing impairment, overcame the stuttering problem, taught myself university courses, and became an excellent salesman and business elite. At the moment of corporate crisis, he turned the tide through his marketing eloquence, went through untold hardships, and finally became a story of a generation of speakers.
title: Dream Speaker
